channel.title: [718/753] Rune-Evo v3 - It's finally here! Content packed!
channel.description:
[size=7][font=impact]Rune-Evo v3[/font][/size]
[b]Screenshots Album[/b]: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/sh/s99u9pwtksfcp4h/B5_aHT92rB]https://www.dropbox.com/sh/s99u9pwtksfcp4h/B5_aHT92rB[/url]
Basically tired of people using Rune-Evo v1 and v2 which has very few things added compared to the original matrix release, which both contain alot of bugs and a couple of dupes. Rune-Evo v3 has no more known dupes (including dropping, and BoB dupes). Server has a new cache featuring a shitload of 753 items and interfaces (goes up to 1406?) including Drygores, Kalphite Armour, Sheathed items, and off-hand items. I collaborated with Justin Hopler and a few other select people to make this a high revision server that retains is stability and playability. Enjoy!
[hr]
[b]Download Rune-Evo v3.zip[/b] (784.4 MB) [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!wIog1YxQ!HcxEoXpPXhZYAGypovlqyh5cgFEj2tcxMPjiMMGOQDQ]https://mega.co.nz/#!wIog1YxQ!HcxEoXpPXhZYAGypovlqyh5cgFEj2tcxMPjiMMGOQDQ[/url]
[b]Foxtrot 718 Client.zip[/b] (5.8MB): [url=http://uppit.com/2eto20u1f12h/Foxtrot_718_Client.zip]http://uppit.com/2eto20u1f12h/Foxtrot_718_Client.zip[/url]
[hr]
Server download includes the nice and shiny 753 cache. Any 718 client will work without edits. Enjoy.
[b]Anti-Leeches:[/b] Had to for this release, didnt want nubs changing name and running it as-is claiming they did it all
[ul][li]Changed a certain skilling item to be worth max cash (not hard to find)[/li] [li]Removed all the item bonuses' text files (easy to replace, get them from another server if you have to xD)[/li][/ul] [b]Server Features:[/b]
[ul][li][b]Cosmetic Overrides[/b] - Some need to be unlocked by doing Zombies below[/li] [li][b]Zombies Onslaught Minigame [/b]- Endless waves of zombies - Max of 50 zombies on field at once - in multi area :3[/li] [li][b]Custom Dungeoneering System[/b] - Three different areas for different difficulties - Based on dungeoneering level[/li] [li][b]Tyluurs Dungeoneering System - [/b]Two different floors - Includes bosses - Lobby system and multi-player[/li] [li][b]753 items and interfaces[/b] - Drygores, Kalphite Armour, Sheathed, and Off-Hands added - Sheathing is not yet possible and off-hands dont work, but they're there[/li] [li][b]Boss Contracts, to influence more bossing (works really well)[/b] - Contracts offer large rewards for killing the contract - only need to kill boss once to complete contract[/li] [li][b]All Skills Working[/b][/li] [li][b]Now has Flawless switching (a shitload faster than matrix's)[/b] - to make this fast, you only needed to remove the garbage cache system -.-[/li] [li][b]High/Low Alching + Enchanting[/b] - High alch produces more profit than low - Enchant jewelry[/li] [li][b]Automated double exp weekends[/b] - Friday thru Sunday, every weekend. - based on your system time[/li] [li][b]Right click view stats option[/b] - Mods and admins see "Moderate" option on all players above this[/li] [li][b]Custom Title Handler[/b] - Most titles have requirements that need to be met to unlock - Once requirement is met, they're automatically unlocked[/li] [li][b]Added Dwarven Rock Cakes for DH rushers[/b] - Need to add this in to a shop. Cant currently obtain them anywhere[/li] [li][b]Difficulty Selections[/b] - Choose difficulty on login for the first time - Can not go to a harder difficulty until you prestige - After prestiging, can only go harder if you havent gained any exp - Can go to an easier difficulty at any time - Harder difficulties increase drop rates, but lower the exp rate - Easier difficulties decrease drop rates, but higher the exp rate[/li] [li][b]Custom Prestige System[/b] - Bounty hunter skulls to show your prestige level - Prestige shop with Clay weapons, Battle-Mage, trickster, and more - 6 prestige levels in total[/li] [li][b]Skilling Rewards[/b] - Each skill action you gain 1 skill point - Skill Point shop to get exp boosting items[/li] [li][b]PvP System[/b] - Pk Points per kill - Killstreaks - Leaderboards in-game - PkP Shop - Server is PvM based, but PvP is great also :P [/li] [li][b]Loyalty Points[/b] - Awarded 250 points every 30 minutes - Custom titles for loyal members - Auras (standard matrix feature)[/li] [li][b]Squeal of Fortune[/b] - Correct background images, not all messed up - Awarded 2 spins every 24 hours - Works perfect, no known bugs except one where one item doesn't appear on SoF[/li] [li][b]StopForumSpam Integration[/b] - stops players from logging in with a blacklisten IP address - good for stopping players trying to proxy to get in after ip banned[/li] [li][b]Still has standard matrix features untouched (mostly)[/b] - Fight Caves, 63 waves - Fight Kiln, 32 waves? - Full Nex - Queen/King Black Dragon - Kalphite Queen - Crucible - Much More...[/li] [li][b]No more SQL loading[/b] - NPC spawns are loaded via text (data/npcs/CustomSpawns.txt) - Objects are loaded via text (data/map/CustomObjects.txt)[/li][/ul]
[hr] [b]To make yourself owner:[/b] src/com/rs/Settings.java
[code]public static final String[] OWNERS = { "king_fox" };[/code]
change 'king_fox' to your name, in lowercase, with underscores for spaces, then go ingame and type this command [b]::setrights 2 yourname[/b] [hr] [b]To Enabled StopForumSpam Integration:[/b] src/com/rs/Settings.java
[code]public static boolean enableSfs = false;[/code]
change false to true, and done. [hr] [b]To change the server name globally:[/b] src/com/rs/Settings.java
[code]public static final String SERVER_NAME = "Foxtrot 718";{[/code]
change whats in the quotes, compile, restart. [hr]
Well that's it folks, hopefully i covered enough to stop the spam threads and replies "how do i make myself owner" and stuff like that. If not, post your issues and im sure someone might help out ^-^)
Thanks, ~Fox

item.title: [718/753] Rune-Evo v3 - It's finally here! Content packed!
item.dc:creator: @Gromic Gromic
item.description:
@Gromic wrote:

If your still having issues getting your client to properly connect to the server…

I use JDK1.7.0_71 with the JRE7 that gets installed with it. I make sure the server and client ports match!

JDK1.7.0_71 Download: [spoiler]http://www.mediafire.com/download/ndixw184i92hwhx/jdk-7u71-windows-x64.exe[/spoiler]

In the clients loader.java, w/o needing to edit your server ports…

public static final int SERVER_PORT = 43595;
public static final int REVISION = 718;
public static final int SUB_REVISION = 1; <-super important setting on the client, if it's not 1 this will break the client ever connecting!

Using the default installation path for the JDK1.7.0_71 and the JRE7… Never had a problem with the client crashing ever. Always make sure the pathing is directly to what it needs to connect to! Also make sure the server compiler and run batch files have the matching paths exactly like the client. I found this removes the bulk of issues in connectivity and also makes sure it’s using the correct form of java on both ends.

Client compiler path
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_71\bin\javac"

Client run.bat path
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java"

After all that is done your client and server should connect w/o a problem. Only need to change the ip in the client for a friend to connect outside of the server network!

-side note

Anyone know how to add level requirements to items? Not sure where to add or find the code. I’ve check in ItemDefinitions.java & ItemConstants.java tried adding a few different methods in but never got it to compile and then work. Any suggestions or help is appreciated!

Read full topic
item.source: [718/753] Rune-Evo v3 - It's finally here! Content packed!

If that doesn’t work, try updating or downgrading your jdk/jre version.

item.title: [718/753] Rune-Evo v3 - It's finally here! Content packed!
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy101 mikeyboy101
item.description:
@mikeyboy101 wrote:

I just have to say, I GREATLY appreciate your release.

One thing that would nice to get help with, is why other clients do not connect using this source.

I’ve tried at least 3 different (known to be working) 718 clients, I’ve set everything correctly, sub_rev, rev, ports, ip everything so its not that.

I know you’ve released a client with this source, and yes it works, but using another client, might fix the crashes. For I, cannot enter OpenGL mode in the client posted. If I cannot access OpenGL, I’m going to assume others will have the same problem. It gets to the point where the client works, but then there’s other times where it just crashes at login.

Other than that, great release man. Thanks.

I plan to use this source and make a nice rsps community and server with it. Credits will be given.

EDIT: [s]I’ve googled, and looked through numerous forums and posts. I’ve even used the search history shit, and I cannot find out why other clients will not work with this source.

I’m willing to pay $30 to anybody who can explain to me, why other clients are not working (besides the fact of the sub_rev, rev, port, ip, and that type of shit) being correct.

I’m willing to pay $75 for anybody who can provide a 100% fix to the crashes. I can’t have this server crashing when it starts to build a community.[/s]

EDIT:

For those of you who still want to use this source, but with another client. I’ve determined why it wasn’t working with any other client. I recently downloaded another source, and I wanted to set it up with the port 43595, seeing that was port forwarded, and shit was already running on it like that. I changed the port within the server to 43595, and then in all of my 718 clients (in loader.java) (those that I was trying to get running with Rune-Evo’s source). When I tried to connect with those clients to the running server, it did not connect.

This made me think, well how come… I ended up switching back to port 43594 in the server, but I kept the port 43595 in the clients loader.java. Guess what happened next. With the server running on port 43594, and the client SUPPOSED to be loading on port 43595, the client allowed me to connect and log into the server, which tells me the reason the other clients were not working, was because all other clients were still connecting to port 43594, and not the server port of 43595.

In other words, you have two options to run another client w/ this server:

A. find the other variable (probably in another java file), that over rides the port in loader.java, keeping the client connected to 43594 and change it to 43595

B. Change the server port to 43594, and use any client u want :).

EDIT:
OK, so I just wanted to add an update for you ALL, incase you are having the same problems. I have a 64-bit PC and Operating System, thus I have Program Files/Program Files (x86). I have multiple instances of java downloaded. Most of my java is located in Program Files, but there is one located in Program Files (x86).

I ended up switching the client runner.bat with the java located in the (x86) and it seemed to allow me to enter OpenGL, further more, I’ve learned that a jared client allows me to enter OpenGL.

My Java Versions in Program Files:
JDK1.7.0_65
JDK1.8.0_25
JRE1.8.0_25

My Java Versions in Program File (x86):
JRE1.8.0_40

OpenGL fixes ALL problems (crashing in parts of the map/item clarity (better visible view of customs/etc) with another server that I used instead of this source (BoomScape). OpenGL is key to running a successful 718, so I’m putting this out there to help others who cannot enter OpenGL mode.

Any which way, its path problems in your system.

On the downside, however, I will no longer be using this source. Very nice release though. Thanks a lot! As for that user who says “we are not a spoon feeding community” what happened when you were a nub at this stuff? You were looking for help as well. Helping others, doesn’t mean ur spoon feeding them all the time, it means they are learning how code works. Cause they will relies that this is how you do something and try understanding it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @fpsnipmob fpsnipmob
item.description:
@fpsnipmob wrote:

unique boss:

guys ive tried many 718 servers is there an item in 718+ like th eperfect ring that 1 hit kills becasue i cant find it or is there a item like that or how do i make an item like that if there isnt any

You can easly edit the stats of am iteom, mostly everyone chooses “773” which is the Perfect ruby ring. just go to data->items->bonuses->773.txt and edit the stats you want. compile and run, if no stats changed. run server with an IDE like Eclipse.

EDIT: I will re upload for you since the links seem to be broken. Just be sure to give King Fox credit, he spent A Lot of time on this.

Source: https://mega.nz/#!OBYFSKYZ!ybGen8EzQy0AgaaFwsoUwNeMV2EXxBb4KcdyHbFCfp4

Client: https://mega.nz/#!aIZ30bDR!vN1R9fvQ7bagkVwNAkpK91KXEIgWGRKMPXPChDQ1q58

item.dc:creator: @slayer2014 slayer2014
item.description:
@slayer2014 wrote:

Fox2007:

You can use any 718 client. I’ll provide one if i absolutely have to >_>

Okay
step one go into source,
step two open run server in note pad
step three where it says java replace with “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin/java.exe”

if it still does not work go into c-drive and find program(x86) and find java find jdk 1.7.0_45 use go into the bin right click bin on the folders address bar paste that in there.

item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

fire cape bug is very easy to fix, I’ll tell u what it is:

stand a bit away from entrance, and click enter and whilst walking to it open qbd tele or nomad minigame tele becuz those 2 teles start a controller causing fire cave controller to bug n u get put into black hole and u run through each wave every 5 secs. and wen waves completed u get put outside cave with fire cape

you should now be on the right lines of fixing it

item.dc:creator: @thereaper93 thereaper93
item.description:
@thereaper93 wrote:

Idk whenever i go into it i go through every wave…Ill look into it though.

As for the items dropped on death, search for “for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++)”.
The problem is that neither that method nor the one below it for inventory are actually putting any items into the container to be dropped.

I’ll let you go ahead and figure out how to fix the code on that like i did, since i have pointed you in the right direction.

Like i said ill take a look at the fight pits, anything else that I should look at and try to fix? Any problems i fix ill help with here.

item.title: [718/753] Rune-Evo v3 - It's finally here! Content packed!
item.dc:creator: @thereaper93 thereaper93
item.description:
@thereaper93 wrote:

@Elythia
Editing the shops is actually pretty simple.
Go to data folder, items folder, unpackedShops.txt
I’m going to assume you understand what everything in there is saying.
If you don’t, let me know and i’ll do my best to help you without spoon feeding.

Anyways once you have edited everything inside of there to your liking go ahead and save it.
Once it is saved delete packedShops.s, then run your server.
The shops will pack themselves, and there you go.
If you need to change the price of something not using coins as currency there are .java files made for each shop with a special currency.

@everyone else
I am having the same problem as Elythia when it comes to dropping items on death…well sorta.
It doesnt matter how the player dies, where the player dies, or the difficulty the player is, nothing drops on death.

I have searched and searched for an answer, i have tried and tried to fix it, yet to no avail. If someone could help me I would be greatly appreciative.

@Fox
Nice release, thank you so much.
A larger amount of bugs than I originally thought it had, but that’s a good thing considering the fact that it forces people to learn in order to make the server playable.

Read full topic

item.title: [718/753] Rune-Evo v3 - It's finally here! Content packed!
item.dc:creator: @Elithiya Elithiya
item.description:
@Elithiya wrote:

So I’m having a problem with a few things I can’t figure out, because for some odd reason… this stupid feature was added to a game that was meant to lose your items.

“
public void dropItemsOnDeath() {
if (getDifficulty() > 3) {
sendItemsOnDeath(this);
}
}
”

Basically Drop items on difficulty when dead… if you’re not playing extreme or hard… you keep your shit, that’s stupid, however the server files downloaded from this forum… EVERYTHING keeps all its shit when dying. Are you kidding me a runescape where you never lose any of your belongings? That just seems highly pointless…

Does anyone know how to go about fixing this? I’ve tried erasing and editing code, but there’s just so much shit I have no idea.

Also,

How do i go about editing the shops with the evo 3 server files? I’ve tried adding in the shops.txt custom thing, but it wont add or accept the new additions. All I was able to do was change the custom npc’s that spawn in the clan camp (i know bc i changed father Aerik or w/e his name is into a random farmer)

Read full topic
